content: @Damiano Testa, just pinging you here to make sure you see this request https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/pull/4229#discussion_r494186808 to add a module doc-string for trailing_degree.lean.

Dear @Scott Morrison thank you for pinging me! I had received emails about this, but I was unsure whether replying to them was a good idea. Anyway, I am planning to take care of these issues right now!
Ok, I think that I have finally managed to take care of this! It should now be #4294!
